text: Valley Land is an album led by pianist Walter Bishop Jr. which was recorded in 1974 and released on the Muse label.Muse LP series discography: 5050 to 5099 accessed April 18, 2017Muse Records discography accessed April 20, 2017Walter Bishop Jr. catalog accessed April 20, 2017 == Reception == Ron Wynn of AllMusic stated "Bishop demonstrates his proficiency with rapid-fire bop tunes and standards, playing superbly throughout this trio date". == Track listing == All compositions by Walter Bishop Jr. except where noted. # "Invitation" (Bronisław Kaper, Paul Francis Webster) — 8:34 # "Lush Life" (Billy Strayhorn) — 3:48 # "Sam's Blues" — 5:40 # "You Stepped Out of a Dream" (Nacio Herb Brown, Gus Kahn) — 4:12 # "Valley Land" — 5:40 # "Killer Joe" (Benny Golson) — 4:51 # "Make Someone Happy" (Jule Styne, Betty Comden, Adolph Green) — 4:27 == Personnel == *Walter Bishop Jr. — piano *Sam Jones — bass *Billy Hart — drums == References == Category:Walter Bishop Jr. albums Category:1976 albums Category:Muse Records albums
title: Valley Land
